Class IObserverFunctions

  • java.lang.Object
    • observertestharness.IObserverFunctions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IObserver, ISubject
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LeaveRecord, Person, Request, StaffList

    public class IObserverFunctions
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISubject, IObserver
    An interface that allows a class to implement the functions of the "ISubject" class.
